markdownRemark.html: I am really glad I decided to read The Talented Mr. Ripley. I was thinking that I had seen the movie but after reading it I don't think I did. I think I saw parts of the beginning and never really made it through. I have seen this book around and knew about the movie, but I never expected it to be so good. I read a bit about Patricia Highsmith afterwards and I am now excited to read some more things that she wrote. I won't say anymore as this is just a really good book and I am so happy I read it without knowing how all the twists and turns play out.
